document_data.name: Spellbook
document_data.mainbody:
A '''spellbook''' was a type of book that [[wizard]]s and other [[arcane]] spellcasters used to record their known [[spell]]s.

{{quote|''"Of course, they aren't useful to anyone except a trained magic-user. You can go mad trying to read a spell that is beyond your abilities. More than likely, it just won't make any sense.''|[[Halloran]] of the [[Golden Legion]]}}
